entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:23 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:23 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:23 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:23 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:23 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
